title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-2.21 - Vector and vermin control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-2.21 - Vector and vermin control

State Regulations

The premises are to be free of insect and rodent infestations that may cause a nuisance or health hazard. Bats shall be excluded from living areas of occupied buildings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
7-2.21

Amended

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
